abstract: It was one of the happiest days of my life when I started work at Brintons
description: Born in Poland, Mariola chose to come to Australia. After a long wait in Greece, she was finally granted the right to immigrate to Australia. She tells of the second family she found at Brintons carpet factory and how they were there for her during some of her most difficult times.
